api/JMRSDKExampleSnippets.ChangeRaycastS.keywords: Class ChangeRaycastShape Control and change the raycast shape - length and width Inheritance Object ChangeRaycastShape Implements ITouchHandler Namespace : JMRSDKExampleSnippets Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public class ChangeRaycastShape : MonoBehaviour, ITouchHandler Fields lengthSlider Slider to manipulate current length of pointer Declaration public Slider lengthSlider Field Value Type Description Slider pointerLengthText Text showing current length of pointer Declaration public TextMeshProUGUI pointerLengthText Field Value Type Description TextMeshProUGUI pointerWidthText Text showing current width of pointer Declaration public TextMeshProUGUI pointerWidthText Field Value Type Description TextMeshProUGUI widthSlider Slider to manipulate current width of pointer Declaration public Slider widthSlider Field Value Type Description Slider Methods ChangeLength(Single) Change length of raycast. Declaration public void ChangeLength(float value) Parameters Type Name Description Single value Value of raycast length to change to. ChangeWidth(Single) Change width of raycast. Declaration public void ChangeWidth(float value) Parameters Type Name Description Single value Value of raycast width to change to. NullCheck() Checks if PointerLaserUnity or JMRPointerManager is null or not. Try to find and cache the objects if null. Declaration public void NullCheck() OnTouchStart(TouchEventData, Vector2) Function called when touch started. Declaration public void OnTouchStart(TouchEventData eventData, Vector2 TouchData) Parameters Type Name Description TouchEventData eventData Touch related data Vector2 TouchData Position of touch Remarks Not implemented as not required. OnTouchStop(TouchEventData, Vector2) Function called when touch stops Declaration public void OnTouchStop(TouchEventData eventData, Vector2 TouchData) Parameters Type Name Description TouchEventData eventData Touch related data Vector2 TouchData Position of touch Remarks Not implemented as not required. OnTouchUpdated(TouchEventData, Vector2) Function called when touch updates. Update the shape of raycast based on touch position update. x axis is mapped to change width, y axis is mapped to change length. Declaration public void OnTouchUpdated(TouchEventData eventData, Vector2 TouchData) Parameters Type Name Description TouchEventData eventData Touch related data Vector2 TouchData Position of touch Start() Add a global listener Declaration public void Start() updateSliders() Update sliders UI to reflect the current values. index.html.title: Raycast Shape | JMR Samples
index.html.keywords: Raycast Shape Example to change length and width of raycast Scripts ChangeRaycastShape.cs Control and change the raycast shape - length and width. Changing length of JMR Laser Raycast cs JMRPointerManager _jmrPointerManager = FindObjectOfType<JMRPointerManager>(); _jmrPointerManager.MaxPointerCollisionDistance = value; Changing width of JMR Laser Raycast cs PointerLaserUnity _pointerLaserUnity = FindObjectOfType<PointerLaserUnity>(); _pointerLaserUnity.WidthMultiplier = value; How to use? Download and unzip this project. Open the project using Unity Hub. Download and import the latest version of JMRSDK package. Open and play the ChangeRaycastShape scene from Assets/Scenes folder.
